snippet.title: Cinematic Camera & Photo Mode I Feature Highlights Ep 13 I Cities: Skylines II
snippet.description:
📷Lights, Camera, Action!📹
Ready to learn how you can capture the best of your city in Cities Skylines II? We have some shiny new camera tools for you! 

Footage captured In-Game is not final and might change in time for release.

Pre-Order Cities: Skylines II NOW!
https://www.paradoxinteractive.com/games/cities-skylines-ii/about
